meanings.definition: Earthpeas (noun): a type of legume grown in the ground for consumption.
meanings.sent1: I planted earthpeas in my garden last spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested earthpeas from the field.
meanings.sent3: The earthpeas in the stew added a delicious flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her love for earthpeas was as deep as the roots in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The earthpeas were so fresh, they popped in my mouth with each bite.
